text: @AndrewYang @bschapiroMD Might be helpful for where you are to share how well NY, NJ, MA and CT have done with #COVID19  and to look to these states. It is a disaster however stupid leaders in many of these states have somewhere to turn to and choose to ignore them. Shout out to @NYGovCuomo @NJGov et al
